level.heading: AMENDMENT OF NOTICE OF PROCEEDING (ยง 28-2014)

level.text: The Commission at any time prior to its final decision in a proceeding may amend the notice of proceeding to conform to proof or otherwise.
The judge shall be given a reasonable time to answer an amendment and to present his or her defense against any matter charged in an amendment.
